alert.note: Alert for Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:47AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hooker, northwestern Logan, northeastern McPherson and southwestern Thomas Counties through 815 AM CDT/715 AM MDT/... At 747 AM CDT/647 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Tryon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 211 and 213. Highway 97 between mile markers 36 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
